theme-manager.title: Central Theme Manager
theme-manager.subtitle: Color seeds + light/dark with auto-propagation
theme-manager.summary: Single source of truth for palette, typography, and component styling. Change a few seedsâ€”everything updates.

tutorials.title: Toggle Light/Dark in Code
tutorials.description: Switch themes at runtime and broadcast the change to all DataViz components.

tutorials.title: Seed a Custom Palette
tutorials.description: Define Primary/Success/Warning/Error/Info seeds and let the ColorSystem generate the full palette.

tutorials.title: Player Color Picker
tutorials.description: Expose a simple UI to let players choose their own accent color and persist it.

bar-chart.title: Bar Chart
bar-chart.subtitle: Grouped/stacked bars with labels & tooltips
bar-chart.summary: Fast categorical chart with legends, value labels, and hover/click signals.

line-chart.title: Line Chart
line-chart.subtitle: Multi-series trends with markers
line-chart.summary: Smoothed or step lines, optional area fills, and segment hover/selection.

box-plot.title: Box Plot
box-plot.subtitle: Quartiles, whiskers, outliers
box-plot.summary: Visualize spread and skew with automatic quartile computation and optional outlier dots.

waterfall.title: Waterfall
waterfall.subtitle: Step-by-step deltas to a total
waterfall.summary: Shows how individual positives/negatives accumulate from start to finish.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Tracks with events and 'now' marker
timeline.summary: Multi-track time blocks for incidents, quests, or production schedules.

gauge.title: Gauge
gauge.subtitle: Arc meter with ticks and center text
gauge.summary: Configurable sweep, round/square caps, and dynamic center label.

pie-chart.title: Pie / Donut
pie-chart.subtitle: Categories with inside/outside labels
pie-chart.summary: Donut or full pie with leader lines and total-in-center option.

kpi-tile.title: KPI Tile
kpi-tile.subtitle: Headline value with delta & sparkline
kpi-tile.summary: Compact metric tile for quick-glance stats; supports icons and trend line.

radar-graph.title: Radar Graph
radar-graph.subtitle: Multi-axial comparison
radar-graph.summary: Plot actor or faction profiles across multiple axes with fill and outline.

table-grid.title: Table Grid
table-grid.subtitle: Virtualized rows for huge datasets
table-grid.summary: Fast scrolling table with column config, sorting, and selection.

heat-map.title: Heat Map
heat-map.subtitle: Grid intensities with legend
heat-map.summary: Render weighted grids for AI costs, supply/demand, or correlation matrices.

detail-panel.title: Detail Panel
detail-panel.subtitle: Labeled rows, groups, and tags
detail-panel.summary: Flexible facts panel with icons, tooltips, and pill-style tag lists.
